description:
Google Cloud teams work with schools, companies, and government agencies to make them more productive, mobile and collaborative. You will oversee all aspects of the Google Cloud sales process, improving it with your insightful data analysis, troubleshooting, and seamless cross-functional teamwork. Your strategies ensure that companies new to Google products get the highest quality customer support and that the Google Cloud program overall is kept on the cutting edge.

As a Partner Incentive Operations Program Manager at Google Cloud, you'll be part of a team that is responsible for defining the Go-to-Market partner strategy and to run partner incentive programs across all partner types and product areas. You will be responsible for running the incentive programs efficiently. You will be constantly challenging existing processes to achieve additional efficiencies and ultimately strive for effective and efficient incentive processes to achieve minimal operating cost. You will also be responsible for ad hoc reporting that supports and informs the team to make decisions on new partner incentive programs.

You'll help launch, execute, and scale global partner incentives to grow the business of Google Cloud and our partners by performing budgeting, planning, and analysis activities — and through your passion for Google products like G Suite, GCP, and Chrome.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 4 years of operational experience, with a focus on executing operations for large incentive/payment projects.
  • 4 years of experience working in Business Administration, with a background in quantitative analysis and operations.
  • Experience leading large scale initiatives involving multiple stakeholder teams to close and experience in managing large financial budgets.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with running channel incentive programs.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and experience working with multiple stakeholders across the globe.
  • Knowledge of SQL.
  • Demonstrated ability to influence without direct authority and drive change at all levels within an organization.
  • Effective project management, problem-solving and analysis skills, combined with impeccable business judgment.
responsibilities:
• Effective implementation of partner incentives and execution of processes such as onboarding, incentive calculations, incentive support, and payments.
  • Define and manage operational metrics on partner process incentives.
  • Ensure accurate and timely payment of earned incentives.
  • Measure the business impact of process operations improvements and cost of running partner process operations, and provide insights to leadership and inform further innovation.
  • Provide support to ensure effective governance of incentives including during the design process, creating operational documentation, policy review, and exception approval processes.
title: Partner Incentive Operations Manager, Go-to-Market Partnerships, Google Cloud
